Articles.Content:
I wonder about possibilities if GATACA found latter on that Jerome is not Jerome but Vincent, what they would do if they found the truth

 

Do you think Vincent had acted honestly, and perhaps selfishly???

 

https://www.reddit.com/r/FanTheories/comments/2hr8dy/gattaca_vincent_lets_his_brother_drown_at_the_end/

He'll be forced to scrub toilets with a toothbrush until the end of the voyage. Meh, i never liked that movie - too 'gimmicky'.  Entire plot hangs on the curious inability of performing genetic testing in the secure way by the government.
